document_data.caption: A map showing Al-Sabiya River flowing south toward Gana.
document_data.name: Al-Sabiya River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Sabiya River''', also called the '''River of Maidens''', flowed through the central region of the [[Pearl Cities]] of [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Al-Sabiya flowed south from [[Al-Yabki Mountains]] for {{SI|120|mi|k|long=yes}} before emptying into [[Gana Bay]] on the [[Crowded Sea]]. The large trade city of [[Gana]] sat at its mouth.
document_data.Geography: Al-Sabiya originated high in Al-Yabki Mountains near the center of the Pearl Cities region.
